page.title: 06Garvald Farms Cont.....
page.content: In the Garvald area arable farming consists of:- Barley, wheat, oats, potatoes, turnips. protein peas, kale and oil seed rape. As the land rises much of the grass is used for Breeding cows and Breeding ewes, fattening lambs and fattening cattle. Chesters Farm is a poultry farm with 40,000 laying hens, all producing brown eggs and mostly Warren birds being fed on an 18% protein ration. Each bird eating 117 to 120 grammes per day and laying 265 to 270 eggs per year. The average price of eggs is 58 pence per dozen and the feeding price of meal is Â£142.00 per ton.
